Through our portfolio, you can explore our completed works, creative vision, and successful collaboration with clients.

projects.defaultDescription: Project description will be added soon.
projects.defaultApproach: This structure, reminiscent of the historical significance of the city of Bukhara, has been designed as a modern airport while also serving as an important landmark representing tourism, culture, and Islamic heritage. The concept embodies a modern style harmoniously blended with dreams, virtue, national pride, and Islamic values.
projects.defaultTechnicalParams: Note: as this project is conceptual, some area measurements are not specified separately.

airport.title: BUKHARA AIRPORT
airport.subtitle: Modern airport
airport.description: The concept of the new Bukhara International Airport aims to reflect the city's religious, cultural, and historical heritage through modern architecture. The project is visually and conceptually inspired by the crescent moon and 12 stars on the national flag of the Republic of Uzbekistan, as well as Bukhara's historical title "Qubbat al-Islam" â€” "The Dome of Islam." The building facade is inspired by the ancient Ark fortress in a modern form, expressing regional identity. The airport building is functionally zoned: each floor of the terminal is carefully designed for comfortable passenger flow management.
airport.details: A modern airport terminal equipped with sustainable design principles and advanced passenger flow optimization.
airport.idea: To create a modern airport terminal focused on functionality and aesthetics.
airport.technicalParams: Area: 211, 2, âˆ’1 sq.m. Modern security and passenger management systems.
airport.exterior: Modern facade with glass and metal
airport.services: Duty Free, lounge areas, restrooms, passport control

innovative.title: Innovative
innovative.description: Architecture is about creating unique and creative projects that combine aesthetics and functionality. We approach each project individually and offer modern, innovative solutions.

economical.title: Cost-effective
economical.description: Budget adherence and efficient cost management are among the most important aspects of architecture. Through proper planning, we ensure a balance between quality and value.

sustainability.title: Sustainable
sustainability.description: In today's climate conditions, creating environmentally safe and eco-friendly projects is a responsibility. We prioritize energy-efficient solutions and durable, high-quality materials.

clientOriented.title: Client-oriented
clientOriented.description: Architecture transforms clients' visions into reality while ensuring their comfort. Our team deeply analyzes client needs and offers effective solutions for both individual and corporate expectations.

hero.title: Get in touch with us
hero.description: To contact us, please fill out the form below or use the provided contact details. We are ready to respond to any inquiries, project ideas, or cooperation proposals.
hero.description2: We look forward to working with you and adding value to your projects!

info.title: Trust us with your project!
info.description: Our office is located in Tashkent, but we implement projects all across Uzbekistan ðŸ™‚

form.title: Submit an application
form.description: Fill out the application and briefly describe the task. Our specialist will contact you within 1 business day!
form.name: First name
form.disclaimer: Our specialist will contact you within 1 business day!

vacancies.title: Vacancies
vacancies.subtitle: Be among the first to apply!

hero.title: We offer reliable solutions instead of beautiful mistakes.
hero.paragraph1: The main aspect of our activity is not just beautiful visual representations, but solid and technically sound project solutions that pass expert review successfully and are implemented flawlessly on the construction site.
hero.paragraph2: We analyze technical requirements, site conditions, budget and deadlines in depth, so that each project is not only aesthetically expressive, but above all reliable, economically justified and safe.
hero.paragraph3: We strive to make a difference in the world of architecture
hero.paragraph4: Combining our creativity and technical knowledge, we bring fresh, innovative perspectives to every project. Attention and thoroughness at all stages of our projects make us a reliable partner in the industry.

content.leftColumn: We strive to make a difference in the world of architecture
content.rightColumn: Combining our creativity and technical knowledge, we bring fresh, innovative perspectives to every project. Attention and thoroughness at all stages of our projects make us a reliable partner in the industry.
content.centertColumn: We aim to become a global architecture office creating sustainability-oriented projects. Striving for aesthetic and technical perfection, we work to create structures that will serve as a legacy for future generations.

team.title: Our team
team.description: Our team consists of creative and experienced architects, engineers, and designers who specialize in various architectural disciplines. Each team member makes a unique contribution to our projects, helping us exceed client expectations with individual solutions!

innovation.title: INNOVATION
innovation.description: We use advanced technologies in our architectural designs to create projects that shape the future.

quality.title: QUALITY
quality.description: We strive for excellence at every stage of each project, creating long-term value.

sustainability.title: SUSTAINABILITY
sustainability.description: We create eco-friendly projects and use natural resources efficiently.

clientFocus.title: CLIENT-FOCUSED
clientFocus.description: We focus on achieving maximum client satisfaction and offer solutions that fully meet their needs.

hero.title: Mizan is Sustainability
hero.description: Our team identifies potential risks during the design process and focuses on addressing them. This ensures your construction process is free from revisions, schedule delays, and unexpected costs.

block1.title: Mizan is Eco-friendly solutions
block1.description: We apply an eco-friendly construction approach in our projects. Materials used are recyclable, sourced locally, and contribute to economic development. We also maximize natural light and energy use to ensure efficiency in all our projects.

block2.title: Mizan is Community
block2.description: At Mizan, we create solutions that not only benefit the environment but also add value and convenience for society. We design facilities that prioritize human health, improve quality of life, and serve local communities. We create projects aimed at eco-friendly infrastructure and expanding green areas in our cities, preserving natural resources.

block3.title: Mizan is Cost-efficiency
block3.description: We put economic sustainability first in the projects we offer to our clients. Offering energy-efficient, durable buildings with low carbon footprint, we ensure not only environmental but also economic benefits. Using efficient construction technologies, we help our clients make responsible decisions that are beneficial for today and future generations.
